00138 {
00139 // While the ambient, diffuse, specular and emission material parameters
00140 // all have alpha components, only the diffuse alpha component is used in
00141 // the lighting computation.
00142 
00143         float mat[4];
00144         mat[3] = m_alpha;
00145         
00146         mat[0] = m_ambient.getR();
00147         mat[1] = m_ambient.getG();
00148         mat[2] = m_ambient.getB();
00149         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, mat);
00150         
00151         mat[0] = m_diffuse.getR();
00152         mat[1] = m_diffuse.getG();
00153         mat[2] = m_diffuse.getB();
00154         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_DIFFUSE, mat);
00155         
00156         mat[0] = m_specular.getR();
00157         mat[1] = m_specular.getG();
00158         mat[2] = m_specular.getB();
00159         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SPECULAR, mat);
00160         
00161         glMateriali(GL_FRONT, GL_SHININESS, m_shininess);
00162 }
